QuestData.Title: Black Rook Orders
QuestData.Description: The letter is written in midnight ink:$B$B"A demon invasion is imminent, but as long as the fires of Black Rook Hold blaze, we shall protect kaldorei lands. Kill any intruders who stand in our way."$B$B- K.R."$B$BPerhaps Jarod Shadowsong will want to see this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Commander Jarod Shadowsong at Bradensbrook.
